Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • Code

  • public class Code
extends java.lang.Object
    Code: Translates Hack assembly language mnemonics into binary codes. Done with :

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Code()
      Constructor that initializes hashMaps by populating them with codes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDestsToHashMap()
      Method that fills the mapOfDests hashMap with binary codes and equivalent symbols.

      Method that fills the mapOfJumps hashMap with binary codes and equivalent symbols.

      Method that converts a string number to a binary number string.
      java.lang.String getComp(java.lang.String compMnemonic)
      Method that returns the binary code comp mnemonic.
      java.lang.String getDests(java.lang.String destMnemonic)
      Method that returns the binary code dest mnemonic.
      java.lang.String getJumps(java.lang.String jmpMnemonic)
      Method that returns the binary code jump mnemonic.

    • Method Detail

      • getJumps

        public java.lang.String getJumps(java.lang.String jmpMnemonic)
        Method that returns the binary code jump mnemonic.
        Parameters:
        jmpMnemonic - This parameter is the jump mnemonic that is to be converted to hack binary.
        Returns:
        Returns the binary representation of the jump mnemonic as a string.

      • getComp

        public java.lang.String getComp(java.lang.String compMnemonic)
        Method that returns the binary code comp mnemonic.
        Parameters:
        compMnemonic - This parameter is the comp mnemonic that is to be converted to hack binary.
        Returns:
        Returns the binary representation of the comp mnemonic as a string.

      • getDests

        public java.lang.String getDests(java.lang.String destMnemonic)
        Method that returns the binary code dest mnemonic.
        Parameters:
        destMnemonic - This parameter is the dest mnemonic that is to be converted to hack binary.
        Returns:
        Returns the binary representation of the dest mnemonic as a string.

      • addJumpsToHashMap

        public void addJumpsToHashMap()
        Method that fills the mapOfJumps hashMap with binary codes and equivalent symbols. This is only for Jumps.

      • addDestsToHashMap

        public void addDestsToHashMap()
        Method that fills the mapOfDests hashMap with binary codes and equivalent symbols. This is only for destinations.

      • formatNumberAsBinary

        public java.lang.String formatNumberAsBinary(java.lang.String number)
        Method that converts a string number to a binary number string.
        Parameters:
        number - The Number in string for that is to be converted to a 15 bit number.
        Returns:
        Returns the number, the integer, as a binary form. This in string format.
